title: Graphic Designer
jobDescription:
• Taking design briefs to understand requirements.

  • Develop intuitive, usable, and engaging interactions and visual designs for mobile and the web.

  • Designing and producing collateral in accordance with brand guidelines.

  • Presenting ideas, concepts and design solutions to various stakeholders and incorporating their feedback into the final design.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams throughout the design process.

  • Stay abreast of UX trends and look for creative ideas and inspiration.

  • Research and track advancements in mobile application design patterns.

  • Break any design problem down into viable actionable chunks and solve them with clarity and precision.

  • Staying in the loop and on top of the latest standards, changes, trends in the mobile design field.


Experience and Skills

  • Degree in Design, Fine Arts or related field

  • You have prior experience as a Graphic Designer as well as a strong portfolio of related projects

  • You possess a good knowledge of design tools such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop and Animate

  • You pay strong attention to detail and have a keen eye for aesthetics.

  • You have excellent communication skills and can clearly articulate your ideas, designs, and suggestions.

  • You are a strong team player who can collaborate effectively with different stakeholders.

  • Knowledge of video editing is a plus.


Education:

Bachelors degree or equivalent professional experience.


Soft Skills:

  • Good self-organization skills.

  • Strong time management skills.

  • Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written).

  • Flexibility and ability to adapt to change.

  • Self-motivated and agile.

title: Digital Marketing Executive (Manufacturing)
tagsAndSkills: Graphics,Social media marketing,PPC,Google Analytics,SAT,Google AdWords,Link building,content marketing
jobDescription:
• Develop and implement SEO and PPC strategies
  • Create and manage link building strategies, content marketing strategies, and social media presences
  • Innovate and present new marketing platforms and strategies
  • Develop engaging online content including clickbait, forums, videos, graphics, and blogs; monitor and analyse content success
  • Forecast marketing campaign growth and ROI for marketing campaigns
  • Use Google Analytics, Google AdWords, and other relevant sites
  • Drive traffic to company pages
  • Develop and manage projects and team members, including delegating tasks, reviewing team member work, adhering closely to deadlines and to budget, developing and revising ideas, and implementing projects
  • Keep abreast of new social media sites, web technologies, and digital marketing trends; implement these new technologies in developing campaigns and update current campaigns to include new information
Skills:
  • SEO
  • Content Marketing - writing blogs, creatives, newsletter, etc.
  • Social Media marketing
  • Google Ads

title: Business Development Manager (Manufacturing)
tagsAndSkills: Analytical skills,Lead generation,tableau,Sales,digital marketing lead,SAT,pricing strategy,Market research
jobDescription:
• Research and identify new business opportunities - including new markets, growth areas, trends, customers, partnerships, products - or new ways of reaching existing markets
  • Discuss promotional strategy and activities with the marketing department
  • Analyze sales marketing data prepare strategy. Prepare visualizations of the data present to management
  • Market research of competitor products, pricing strategy
  • Arrange webinars, seminars for distributors customers to introduce new products updates
  • Prepare company presentations, catalogue page layouts, product presentations, marketing plans with the help of Digital marketing team
  • Monitor Digital Marketing lead generation activity
Skills:
  • Strong communication and IT fluency
  • Negotiation skills
  • Power BI or Tableau to prepare visualizations charts
  • Strong analytical skills
